ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We thank Mustafa Akiner, Berna Demirci and Giorgi Babuadze for fieldworks in Turkey and Georgia.

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: Financial support was provided by an NIH NIAID grant RO1 AI101112 to JRP. PK was supported by Bodossaki Foundation (Greece). Mosquito specimens from Turkey and Georgia were collected thanks to work carried out under the VectorNet framework contract OC/EFSA/AHAW/ 2013/02-FWC1 funded by the European Food Safety Authority (EFSA) and the European Centre for Disease prevention and Control (ECDC). The funders had no role in the study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.

sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: Raw allele frequencies of the microsatellites dataset are available at VectorBase.org, Project IDVBP0000269. The SNPs dataset is available in VectorBase.org, Project ID VBP0000269.
